AMT_CLS = #{amtCls,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
AMTN_NET_CLS = #{amtnNetCls,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

TURN_ID = #{turnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LZ_CLS_ID2 = #{lzClsId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SCAN_DATE = #{scanDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

REM = #{rem,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
REM = REM,
ADR = #{adr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where IC_ID = #{icId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and IC_NO = #{icNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
